original: intros H. unfold not. intros [x [y [z [H0 [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]]]]]. apply H. exists x, y, z. repeat split; auto. unfold rel_prime, distinct_parity, Z.add, Z.mul in H5. destruct H5 as [H5 | H5]; destruct H5 as [H5a H5b]; destruct H5a as [H5a | H5a]; destruct H5b as [H5b | H5b]. - split; apply Zeven_sqr1; auto. - false. - false. - false. - false. - split; apply Zodd_sqr1; auto.
